parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden failure of the electrical system can cause the motorcycle to shut down while in motion, leading to a loss of control, increased risk of accidents, and potential serious injury or death.
symptoms: The motorcycle's engine and electrical components suddenly shut down
leaving the rider without power or control.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Sudden Engine Shut-Off and Loss of Electrical Power
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden loss of engine power and electrical systems can cause a loss of control, increasing the risk of accidents, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: The engine shuts off without warning
the vehicle restarts on its own.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The exhaust system design flaw can cause burns to the driver, especially when properly dressed, which can lead to injuries and discomfort.
symptoms: The driver experiences burns while driving
the cross-over pipe is located too close to the seat.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Unintended Drift or Pull to One Side
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The motorcycle's tendency to veer left or pull to one side can cause loss of control, especially when hands are removed from the handlebars, which can lead to accidents or near-miss situations.
symptoms: The motorcycle drifts or pulls to one side while driving on flat surfaces
the motorcycle crosses the centerline of the road when hands are removed from the handlebars
the motorcycle requires constant correction to maintain a straight line.
